value.name: Reform starts with humanity: That’s the quintessential, often missing ingredient in policing
value.description: America’s long-overdue process of reforming law enforcement picked up steam in the year since the nation reacted in outrage to video depicting the slow murder of George Floyd by a Minneapolis policeman.
